name: EXTINCT- Demo
description:
When a young woman awakens she is thrust into a world different and changed from the one she fell asleep in. With the help of her Engaging Robotic Intelligence Companion (or E.R.I.C. for short) she will set off on a quest to save humanity.

Made this demo for My First Game Jam! Learned a lot while working on this and I do plan to expand and finish the game.
